entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. A few flurries near the British Columbia border early this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
